Q: Are there any specific medicines to prevent or treat the new #coronavirus (2019-nCoV)? A: To date, there is no specific medicine recommended to prevent or treat the virus. WHO is helping to accelerate research and development efforts with a range of partners.

Q: Can pets at home spread the new #coronavirus (2019-nCoV)? A: At present, there is no evidence that companion animals/pets such as dogs, cats can be infected with the virus. However, it is always a good idea to wash your hands with soap and water after contact with pets
